item.title: BattleScape?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:3, topic:243094"][quote author=ziplock link=topic=319407.msg2530957#msg2530957 date=1226447226]

How do I get on “BattleScape?”

uum, is that your question? this is not a help section to connect to a server no one has ever heard of…this is to help “code” your own damn server.
[/quote]

Battlescape is probably the most popular Runescape private server there is.[/quote]

Well 'rich…ok…but i have never heard of it (probably because i don’t play private severs) and still this really isn’t about server help O_o i love you rich don’t hurt me.

Read full topic
